full_summary:
================================

## Government Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Title:** 23145-230442 - Laboratory Microwave Digestion System

**Solicitation Number:** WS3698138683

**Publication Date:** October 25, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** November 15, 2022 at 2:00 PM (EST)

## Introduction

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites tenders from eligible suppliers for the supply, delivery, and installation of a Microwave Digestion System. The system will be installed in the Analytical Chemistry Laboratory at the Pacific Forestry Centre (PFC) in Victoria, British Columbia.

## Proposal Details

* The procurement category for this solicitation is Goods and Services.
* The notice type is Request for Proposal (RFP).
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The selection criteria is Lowest Price.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to trade agreement countries, including Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Delivery Regions

The proposed delivery region is British Columbia.

## Contact Information

For more information or to obtain the solicitation documents, please contact:

Brittney Jackson
Procurement Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Phone:  (619) 786-5719 (pas disponible)
Email: <brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

## Tender Documents

Tender documents are available at the Government Electronic Tender Service (GEDS) website: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14460204?extsite=MTQ0NjAyMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Closing Date and Time

The tender closing date and time is November 15, 2022 at 2:00 PM (EST). Late submissions will not be accepted. It is the supplier's responsibility to ensure submission by the tender closing date and time.  All prices must be quoted in Canadian dollars.

Informatino Privacy
==================

Under the _Privacy Act_, goods and services acquired by the government of Canada are not personally identifiable and may be made available for review
